name: Green Ashes - UNICAP 2021
description:
This is a Helicopter Firefighting game developed for PC during my university classes. The greatest challenge here was to come up with an idea for a game that would satisfy our teachers back there heheh. One of them sorted us some cards with some elements and then we had to create a game based on them.

I did all the art, animation and programming of this game and my friend was the game designer and QA.

Please, contact me if you are interested in having a look at the source code of this project.

pedroc.sousa@hotmail.com
